title: EZ Auto Scheduler
description: EZauto Scheduler is the only auto-scheduling software that is fully customizable to work the way you do. You can assign people and resources as well as set appointments directly from your website or your browser. EZauto Scheduler will send e-mail, phone, or text reminders to encourage recurring appointments. These reminders can be set to be triggered months in advance. EZauto Scheduler is mobile-friendly and accessible from any mobile device tablet or phone to see and schedule automotive appointments.
